column5: 1 piece each.  The scallop was fine
column6: chewy  and not gritty. The wagyu beef was nice
column9: but a good contender.  (*the best is reserved for Inyo in Vegas*)  The Kampachi was excellent. Both tuna nigiri were alright
column10: but it didn't seem all that fatty.  It didn't have the same melty softness that I am used to.  In fact
column11: I felt the otoro piece was less than the chutoro.  In fact
column12: it may have both been otoro
column13: but definitely the fish lacked a usual softness.
